title: Action Learning-Based Short-Intensive Course for Developing Influence Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course for graduate students to enhance their impact in mathematics education settings.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more effective communication strategies with fellow teachers and students in mathematics education settings
Learners can design and implement practical solutions to educational problems through the action learning process
Learners document their influential skills development process in reflective journals and propose improvements based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
